title: 有关summon的指令
author: Mar_s
txt_content:
游戏版本:1.8
想生成一只50血量，无击退的僵尸怎么做
我输入/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Health:50f}，好像生成的是20血的僵尸
求助qwq

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content: 浅念哥 发表于 2017-8-21 17:20/summon Zombie ~ ~ ~ {Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:50},{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:100}]}复制代码当前防击退为100，修改即可。

replies.author: Mar_s
replies.txt_content:
Sakura_End 发表于 2017-8-21 17:02
/summon Zombie ~ ~ ~ {Health:50,AbsorptionAmount:,ArmorDropChances:[0:0.085f,1:0.085f,2:0.085f,3:0.0 ...
显示解析失败

replies.author: Mar_s
replies.txt_content:
Mar_s 发表于 2017-8-21 17:09
显示解析失败
哦，生成了一只，但是还是20血量的僵尸qwq
